0.text: Innate: Each time Jayce switches between  Hammer Stance and  Cannon Stance he gains  40 bonus movement speed and  ghosting for 0.75 seconds.
Active: Jayce  leaps to the target enemy's location and smashes his hammer on the ground upon arrival, dealing physical damage to all enemies within an area and  slowing them for 2 seconds.

1.text: Lightning Field can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Passive: Jayce's basic attacks restore  mana  on-hit.

1.text: Active: Jayce surrounds himself with an electric field for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to all nearby enemies over the duration.

0.text: Active: Jayce swings his hammer at the target enemy, dealing magic damage, capped against  monsters, while also  pulling them to a location 500 units in front of him.

0.content: 8 / 10.4 / 12.8 / 15.2 / 17.6 / 20% of target's maximum health (+ 100% bonus AD)

0.text: Active: Jayce transforms into  Cannon Stance, receiving access to its abilities, becoming  ranged with  500 attack range, and empowering his next basic attack to reduce the target's  armor and  magic resistance by 10 / 15 / 20 / 25% (based on level) for 5 seconds.

1.text: Jayce begins the game with Transform but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic abilities each have 6 ranks.

0.text: Innate: Each time Jayce switches between  Hammer Stance and  Cannon Stance he gains  40 bonus movement speed and  ghosting for 0.75 seconds.
Active: Jayce fires an electric bolt in the target direction that detonates upon hitting an enemy or max range, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and briefly granting  sight of the area.

1.text: If the bolt passes through  Acceleration Gate, it supercharges: dealing 40% increased damage with increased speed, range and explosion radius.

0.text: Active: Jayce gains  300% bonus attack speed on his next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds, each one dealing modified damage.Hyper Charge's total damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

1.text: Hyper Charge  resets Jayce's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Jayce deploys an energy gate centered at the target location for 4 seconds, granting  sight of its area. Jayce and all allied champions can move through it to gain  bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.

1.text: The buff is continuously refreshed while inside the gate. Acceleration Gate will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Jayce transforms into  Hammer Stance, receiving access to its abilities, becoming  melee with  125 attack range, gaining 5 / 15 / 25 / 35 (based on level)  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance, and empowering his next basic attack to deal 25 / 65 / 105 / 145 (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus magic damage.

1.text: Jayce begins the game with Transform but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic abilities each have 6 ranks.
